content:
smile and a nod,
But it wasn't just any money, it was something odd.

It wasn't green, it wasn't paper-made,
It wasn't kept in a wallet, or put in a savings shade,
It was digital, special and unique,
And it went by the name of Bitcoin, oh so sleek!

Now many folks in that land, didn't understand,
Why Bitcoin was so important, they just couldn't grasp the hand,
But the young folks, they knew the deal,
And wanted to share with others, what they really felt.

So they got together and wrote this book,
To teach about Bitcoin, and how to read the nook,
About saving, spending, and making it grow,
And how with Bitcoin, your money's always on the go!

With rhyming verse and silly illustrations,
They showed how sound money and saving have no limitations,
They explained how Bitcoin is secure, fast, and fair,
And how it's changing the world, beyond compare.

So if you're young, or young at heart,
And want to learn about Bitcoin, and do your part,
Just read this book, and take a look,
At the importance of sound money, saving and Bitcoin, it's just a good hook!

So remember, always save, spend wisely too,
And with Bitcoin, your money will grow for you,
It's fun, it's sunny, and always secure,
And the future of money, we're sure!
